answers.answer: Hi,How are you?Thanks for writing in.Burning sensation in the tongue along with loss of taste sensation raises the symptom of glossodynia. Some of the causes include diabetes, anxiety, depression, and menopause, oral disorders like thrush or dry mouth or damage to the nerves including the cranial nerves.Low dose benzodiazepines and antidepressants help. Please consult your PCP about it. Take care!
